product_name: Trico Sports Painkiller Saddle Pad - Medium
long_description: A Memoflex(R) gel inside pad helps form a fluid barrier between the rider and the hard shell, reducing shock and abrasion. Smooth cover is bonded to the saddle-hugging base for extra durability. Abrasion-resistant Tuff Edges(TM) adds to durability and a drawstring closure helps it conform tightly to the saddle. Fits most ATB and road saddles.
short_description: A Memoflex(R) gel inside pad helps form a fluid barrier between the rider and the hard shell, reducing shock and abrasion.
